ticket.title: Repo mirror update hardening: locked updates, bounded fetch, remote URL allowlist, and receipts

tickets.reason: Repo mirror is used for lanes.

in_scope: Protect mirror updates against races and malicious configuration:
- lock mirror update with file lock
- bound fetch size/time (best-effort) to prevent disk blowups
- refuse symlink components in mirror path
Emit mirror update receipts with before/after refs.

steps: Implement mirror update function with locking.
Add policy config for allowed remotes.

criteria: Mirror update is deterministic, bounded, and auditable.
